attributes.action: sack his Foreign Secretary, David Milliband, for condoning torture and trying to prevent British courts investigating its use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand the resignation of Foreign Secretary, David Milliband, for condoning the use of torture and trying to prevent British courts from investigating British complicity in its use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
